title: (x) Polish character set for Neue Helvetica {Yves}
content:
Hi all,   
   
I know it's not identifying a font per se, but I'm in need of a character set identifying containing a Polish characters, for Helvetica Neue (or similar i.e. Akzidenz, Arial, Helvetica).
author: anonymous

comments.content:
The Polish character set is comprised in all CE (Central European)   
fonts, so Linotype's [Helvetica Neue CE](http://web.archive.org/web/20120418085755/http:/www.fontshop.com/index.cfm?fuseaction=verity.search&font_categories=1&font_categories_search=font_name_search&searchstr=helvetica+neue+ce) is what you need.

Thanks very much, that's really helpful.   
   
Barry
